column4: i'm running xubuntu 7.04, but i want to upgrade to ubuntu 7.04. i had to use a xubuntu cd cause thats all i had availeble at the moment.
no xubuntu 7.04 to ubuntu 7.04. i just installed it
it was the only cd i had on hand that worked
yes, the ubuntu-desktop metapackage has all the ubuntu gnome stuff
